user_details.name: Rishabh sharma
user_details.address: Sector 119, Balongi, Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar, Punjab 160055

about.title: Experienced Full-Stack Developer | 5+ Years in Web, App & Blockchain Development
about.description: Versatile Full-Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience delivering dynamic, scalable, and secure web and mobile applications. Proficient in React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, and TypeScript, with deep expertise in databases like MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and Redis. Skilled in API design (REST & GraphQL), cloud deployments, and DevOps practices. Experienced in blockchain development with Solidity, smart contracts, and Web3.js. Passionate about clean code, scalable architecture, performance optimization, and constantly adapting to emerging technologies.

edu_exp.role: Full Stack developer | Blockchain | Solidity | Redis | PostgreSQL

services.title: Frontend Development Specialist
services.desc: Expertise in building intuitive and responsive user interfaces using React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, and Redux. Skilled in modern UI/UX principles, performance optimization, and integrating APIs for seamless user experiences.

services.title: Backend & API Development Expert
services.desc: Proficient in Node.js, Express.js, and database management (MongoDB, PostgreSQL) to develop scalable and secure server-side applications. Experienced in RESTful and GraphQL APIs, authentication, and cloud integrations.

services.title: Full-Stack Application Architect
services.desc: Strong ability to design and develop end-to-end solutions by combining frontend and backend expertise. Skilled in DevOps, CI/CD pipelines, microservices architecture, and cloud deployment, ensuring high-performance and scalable applications.

services.title: Blockchain Development Specialist
services.desc: Hands-on experience in building decentralized applications (dApps) using Ethereum, Solidity, and smart contracts. Proficient with Web3.js, wallet integrations, NFTs, and blockchain security practices.

services.title: PostgreSQL & Redis Integration Expert
services.desc: Advanced knowledge of PostgreSQL for relational data modeling and Redis for high-speed caching and pub/sub systems. Skilled in optimizing query performance, designing scalable data layers, and implementing hybrid database architectures.
